00034 // =============================================================================
00036 void WaveSine :: init()
00037 {   
00038 
00039     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameRate);
00040     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameRate] = aw::gTypeMono;
00041 
00042     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameMinimum);
00043     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameMinimum] = aw::gTypeMono;
00044 
00045     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameMaximum);
00046     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameMaximum] = aw::gTypeMono;
00047 
00048     // setup some default generators 
00049     Generator::setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, 0,
00050                     aw::pContextNameNone);
00051     Generator::setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, 1,
00052                     aw::pContextNameNone);
00053     Generator::setParameter(aw::pNameRate, .2,
00054                     aw::pContextNameFrequency);
00055 
00056     reset();
00057 }

00075 // =============================================================================
00076 // set frequency
00077 
00078 // if our frequency is .5 hz, it means that our period is 2 seconds
00079 // if our frequency is 2 hz, it means tt our period is .5 second
00080 // if fq is 4 hz, period is .25 seconds
00081 // p == 1 / fq
00082 // fq == 1/ p
00083 
00084 
00085 
00086 
00087 // =============================================================================
00088 double WaveSine :: getValueAtSample(aw::SampleTimeType st)
00089 {
00090     
00091     sampleTime_ = st;
00092     sr_ = sys_->getSamplingRate();
00093 
00094     periodSamples_ = pMap_[aw::pNameRate]->getValueAtSample(st);
00095 
00096 //     if ((aw::SampleTimeType) st % 4410 == 0) {
00097 //         std::cout << "sample time: " << (aw::SampleTimeType) sampleTime_ << " raw rate value: " << periodSamples_ << std::endl;
00098 //         };
00099 
00100 
00101     periodSamples_ = getValueWithContextToPeriodSamples(periodSamples_,
00102                      aw::pNameRate, sr_);
00103 
00104     // phase might be a parameter
00105     // aw::SampleTimeType samplePhase = 0; // between 0 and 1
00106 
00107     value_ = sin(sampleTime_ * aw::pi2 / periodSamples_);
00108 
00109     // alternative arrangement gives same results
00110     // value_ = sin((double) sampleTime_ / periodSamples_ * aw::pi2);
00111 
00112     // normalize and scale
00113     return aw::denorm((1.0 + value_) * 0.5, 
00114         pMap_[aw::pNameMinimum]->getValueAtSample(st),
00115         pMap_[aw::pNameMaximum]->getValueAtSample(st)
00116         );
00117 };
